alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oswego County through 215 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Central Square, or 15 miles northeast of Baldwinsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Central Square, Brewerton, Constantia, West Monroe, Cleveland, Bernhards Bay, Amboy Center, Mallory, and Gayville. This includes Interstate 81 near exit 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
